text: Lam sao (co the co mot hiep uoc) khi ma, neu chung gianh uoc quyen thong tri oi voi cac nguoi thi chung se chang them coi trong cac nguoi ve moi quan he ho hang hay hiep uoc uoc ky ket? Chung chi lam hai long cac nguoi bang mieng mom cua chung con long da cua chung thi khong he. That vay, a so bon chung la nhung ke day loan, bat tuan
